instruction: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Make a curry base with coconut milk.
Soak rice and dal separately for 6 hours.
Grind to a smooth batter and ferment overnight.
Steam batter in idli molds for 10-12 mins.
Boil dal with veggies and spices for sambar.
Turn off heat and add lemon juice.
Prepare tadka with ghee, cumin, onion, tomato.
Add spices and cook oil separates.
Temper mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Add hot water and rava, stir well.
Sauté minced garlic in olive oil.
Stir fry veggies on high heat.
Add rice and sauces, toss well.
